title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.41 - Balance sheet
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.41 - Balance sheet

State Regulations
A statement of financial position of any economic unit, or component thereof, reporting as at a given moment of time its assets (at
cost, depreciated cost, or other indicated value), its liabilities, and its
ownership equities recorded under an accounting system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.41

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
